attributes.action: forgive the President and First Lady Obama, the U. S. State Department, and the current administration for the rude and arrogant treatment he received during his trip to the U. S. We refer to the lack of a state dinner, the lack of a joint press conference, and the entirely inappropriate gifts presented to the Prime Minister, his family, and the people of our closest ally.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I know this method of communication is not to be used for this purpose or by a non-citizen of the United Kingdom. I hope you also forgive me for using this method of communicating, but we feel the need to express in a public manner what we and many of my fellow citizens understand was rude, incompetent, and ignorant. We apologize, and we thank the Prime Minister and the people of the United Kingdom for all they do to help the United States. We will follow up this apology with a letter to the British Embassy, and a request to our elected representatives in the Congress to also apologize.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
